ModMetaData.name: Squared: Life Support
ModMetaData.author: FrankWilco, Troopersmith1, KongMD, Revolus
ModMetaData.description: Life Support is a mod that adds the Life Support System building. It's a linkable to beds that will prevent a pawn from dying if they lose organs. I took this building from the mod 'Questionable Ethics' and made it a standalone mod to increase mod compatibility. See the mod description page on Steam for more information.
